item.title: Fires break out on two buses in Dhaka
item.description: Fires have broken out on two buses in Dhaka’s Shahjadpur and Merul Badda areas. One of the buses is owned by Victor Paribahan, while the other is owned by Akash Paribahan. The incidents occurred early on Monday morning. However, their causes have yet to be determined, bdnews24.com reports.
